articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: The Supreme Court's conservative majority is a threat to the world
articles.description: The Supreme Court spent recent weeks triggering political and legal earthquakes across America. But its latest audacious blow could affect the entire planet.

articles.title: Ex-Trump official describes conversation with Hutchinson after bombshell testimony - CNN Video
articles.description: Alyssa Farah Griffin, Trump's former White House director of strategic communications, discusses how Cassidy Hutchinson is doing following her bombshell testimony to the Jan. 6 committee.

articles.author: Abby Phillip, Steve Almasy
articles.title: It's been 130 days since WNBA star Brittney Griner was detained in Russia and her trial is about to start. Her wife wants US officials to do more to bring her home
articles.description: Cherelle Griner, the wife of WNBA star Brittney Griner, told CNN on Thursday she wants US officials to do whatever they have to do to bring the basketball legend home -- and she needs to see them do more.

articles.author: Jamiel Lynch and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Georgia Supreme Court overturns prominent Atlanta attorney's murder conviction in wife's killing
articles.description: Georgia's highest court on Thursday unanimously overturned the murder conviction of a prominent Atlanta attorney in the death of his wife and granted him a new trial.

articles.author: Ryan Nobles, Annie Grayer and Zachary Cohen, CNN
articles.title: Tony Ornato met with January 6 committee twice
articles.description: The House select committee investigating January 6, 2021, met with former White House deputy chief of staff Tony Ornato on two occasions in January and March as part of its investigation, according to a source familiar with his testimony.

articles.title: Hutchinson was 1 of the witnesses Trump world sought to influence

articles.author: Rebekah Riess, Jennifer Henderson and Holly Yan, CNN
articles.title: After 43 days on the run, the woman accused of killing an elite cyclist was captured in Costa Rica
articles.description: Armstrong was wanted for the May 11 shooting of Anna Moriah "Mo" Wilson, who had previously dated Armstrong's boyfriend. Investigators say the killing may have been a violent act of romantic jealousy.
articles.content:
(CNN)The woman suspected of fatally shooting elite cyclist Anna Moriah "Mo" Wilson in Texas has been captured in Costa Rica, the US Marshals Office said Thursday.

articles.title: Analysis: Liz Cheney perfectly captured the choice Republicans now have to make on Donald Trump
articles.description: On Wednesday night, Liz Cheney made it clear: Republicans can't have it both ways.
